resources.string: Na settings ah URL kha khumh.txt
Data le kharnak vialte kha hloh dih
URL kha chiah lo ding, settings.txt kha thlen ding kha hmailei ah chiah
Hi app hi update a si cang nain na pehtlaihmi server nih hin weeWX caah Inigo Plugin cu a update lo. Fields cu weeWX update an tuah hlan tiang ttha tein an lang kho lo
Na pekmi URL kan verify lio ah rak hngak rih
Data vialte hloh dih na duh ti kha na zumh maw?
Icons nih tling tein download an tuah kho lo, na retry a hau lai
Forecast icons pawl cu an rak hngalh khawh lo caah a si
Ka Fix lai i, i zuam ṭhan
Hmannak update tuah aa zuam lio ah palhnak a um
Custom URL in a langhtermi custom URL in pehtlaihnak le download tuah khawh a si lo maw
Na server chungin webcam hmanthlak pakhat kha a pehtlaih khawh lo asiloah download khawh a si lo maw
Forecast pehtlaihnak le download tuah khawh a si lo
Forecast icons pawl cu an rak hngalh khawh lo caah a si
Forecast phun \'%1$s\' nih icons a ngeih a herh, Icon hmannak ah thlen law i zuam than
Forecast type \'%1$s\' cu a hman lo, na settings file kha zoh law i zuam ṭhan
Internet in radar= hmanthlak pawl kha pehtlaihnak le download tuahnak in download khawh a si lo caah
Na server chungin data.txt pehtlaihnak le download tuah khawh a si lo maw
Data URL cu a thiang lo
Na server chungin settings pawl kha pehtlaihnak le download tuah khawh a si lo maw
URL cu default ah an chiah asiloah a lawngmi a si
Forecast pehtlaihnak le download tuah khawh a si lo
A luan ciami kum 2019 nak in a si
A luan ciami thla hna ah Statistics
Radar URL cu set lo. Thlennak caah settings ah na kal khawh
Radar hmanthlak cu download a si rih
Radar hmanthlak download tuah khawh a si lo
Hmuhchungnak data kha tuaktan khawh lo
Update tuah a si ko nain WiFi pehtlaihnak a um lo
Update karlak cu a dik lo, settings kha update tuah hnu ah tuah ṭhan a si
Na server chungin data.txt download tuah i zuam
Radar phun \'%1$s\' cu a hman lo, na settings file kha zoh law i zuam than
Webcam hmanthlak cu download a si rih
Webcam URL cu set a si lo asiloah a thiang lo
Manual updates ah chiah, asinain a chunglei thilri a um rih lo
